attributes.action: stop banning activities of which his Government does not approve and put an end to 'Bannit Britain'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rather than education and debate designed to inform free choice, modern Government seems to favour banning activities of which it does not approve.  

This removes choices and the opportunities citizens have to learn from those choices.  It restricts their experiences and, often, bans have unfortunate and unintended consequences.  

We believe it is time to allow the UK's citizens to make informed choices without bans.
